section.name: Download
section.p: Download the appropriate package for your operating system.

p.strong: NOTE: Java version 1.5 or higher is required before Jukes will run.

subsection.name: Windows
subsection.p: Just unzip the file and double click the EXE to run the application. Make sure the DLL is in the same directory as the EXE for the tray icon to work.

subsection.name: Linux, MacOSX, Solaris
subsection.p: Just unzip the file and execute "javaw -Xms128m -Xmx256m -jar jukes-4.0.1.24-app.jar"
